name: A date with Corona-Chan
description:
Hello everybody!

Tough times aren't they! Here in Europe the situation is pretty heavy and the quarantine is getting so strict. So I guessed it would be nice to make a small game where we could get our revenge on Corona-chan.

Have fun and stay safe!

If you like my stuff, consider supporting me on Patreon:

https://www.patreon.com/babusgames
